title: Stream: The Knife – Shaking The Habitual
content:
This April, The Knife release their first studio album since Silent Shout seven years ago.

The album, Shaking The Habitual, is now available to pre-order as a 2xCD, 3×12″ Vinyl and on iTunes. Having released the singles A Tooth For An Eye and Full Of Fire, you can now stream the record in full below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
